message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm only willing to pay $110 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $130.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. How about $125? I'm really interested in this product and I'm sure we can find a price we're both happy with.
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, but I need to make a bit more than $125. I'm willing to go up to $135, but I'm not willing to go any lower.
